00045 #include <stdio.h>
00046 
00047 #ifndef LINUX 
00048 #include "ueaclib.h"
00049 #endif 
00050 
00051 #include "ueac.h"
00052 #include "lla.h"
00053 #include "conversion.h"
00054 #include "filter.h"
00055 #include "global.h"
00056 
00057 #define INSTR ueac_state->instruction
00058 #define LLA_TABLE ueac_state->lla_table
00059 
00060 #define DISABLE 0
00061 #define ENABLE 1
00062 #define UNINITIALIZED 0xFF
00063 
00064 int lla_report (ueac_t *ueac_state,lla_data_t *lla_data) {
00065   int index;
00066   int ret_val=-1;
00067   index=INSTR.lla_descriptor-1;
00068   if (LLA_TABLE[index].enable==ENABLE) {
00069     lla_data->input=LLA_TABLE[index].in_val;
00070     lla_data->output=LLA_TABLE[index].out_val;
00071     ret_val=0;
00072   }
00073   return ret_val;
00074 }
00075 
00076 int lla_add (ueac_t *ueac_state) {
00077   int index;
00078   index=INSTR.lla_descriptor-1;
00079   LLA_TABLE[index].enable=DISABLE;
00080   LLA_TABLE[index].in_pin=(INSTR.pin_y-1)*5+(INSTR.pin_x-1);
00081   if ((INSTR.pin_x_alt==0)||(INSTR.pin_y_alt==0)) {
00082     LLA_TABLE[index].out_pin=0xFF;
00083   }
00084   else {
00085     LLA_TABLE[index].out_pin=(INSTR.pin_y_alt-1)*5+(INSTR.pin_x_alt-1);
00086   }
00087   LLA_TABLE[index].function_ptr=(int *)lla_function_index[INSTR.lla_function-1];
00088   LLA_TABLE[index].period=INSTR.lla_period;
00089   LLA_TABLE[index].accumulator=0;
00090   ueac_state->lla_input|=(unsigned long)(0x00000001<<LLA_TABLE[index].in_pin);
00091 #ifndef LINUX 
00092   write_lla(LLA_TABLE[index].in_pin,1);
00093 #endif 
00094   LLA_TABLE[index].in_val=0;
00095   LLA_TABLE[index].out_val=0;
00096   LLA_TABLE[index].enable=ENABLE;
00097   return 0;
00098 }
00099 
00100 int lla_disable (ueac_t *ueac_state) {
00101   int index;
00102   int ret_val=-1;
00103   index=INSTR.lla_descriptor-1;
00104   if (LLA_TABLE[index].enable==ENABLE) {
00105     ueac_state->lla_input&=~((unsigned long)(0x00000001<<LLA_TABLE[index].in_pin));
00106     LLA_TABLE[index].enable=DISABLE;
00107 #ifndef LINUX    
00108     write_lla(LLA_TABLE[index].in_pin,0);
00109     write_current(LLA_TABLE[index].out_pin,0);
00110 #endif 
00111     ret_val=0;
00112   }
00113   return(ret_val);
00114 }
00115 
00116 int lla_enable (ueac_t *ueac_state) {
00117   int index;
00118   int ret_val=-1;
00119   index=INSTR.lla_descriptor-1;
00120   if (LLA_TABLE[index].enable==DISABLE) {
00121     ueac_state->lla_input|=(unsigned long)(0x00000001<<LLA_TABLE[index].in_pin);
00122 #ifndef LINUX
00123     write_lla(LLA_TABLE[index].in_pin,1);
00124     write_current(LLA_TABLE[index].out_pin,0);
00125 #endif 
00126     LLA_TABLE[index].in_val=0;
00127     LLA_TABLE[index].out_val=0;
00128     LLA_TABLE[index].enable=ENABLE;
00129     ret_val=0;
00130   }
00131   return(ret_val);
00132 }
00133 
00134 int evaluate_lla(ueac_t *ueac_state) {
00135   ueacval_t result;
00136   static unsigned char count=0;
00137   if (++count>9) {
00138     count=0;
00139   }
00140   if (LLA_TABLE[count].enable==ENABLE) {
00141 #ifndef LINUX
00142     convert_a2d(I_CONVERSION,pin_data[LLA_TABLE[count].in_pin].filtered_result,&result,LLA_TABLE[count].in_pin);
00143 #else 
00144     convert_a2d(I_CONVERSION,0,&result,25);
00145 #endif
00146     LLA_TABLE[count].in_val=result.integer;      
00147     if (++LLA_TABLE[count].counter>=LLA_TABLE[count].period) {
00148       LLA_TABLE[count].counter=0;
00149       LLA_TABLE[count].accumulator+=LLA_TABLE[count].in_val;
00150       LLA_TABLE[count].in_val=(int)(LLA_TABLE[count].accumulator/LLA_TABLE[count].period);
00151       if (LLA_TABLE[count].in_val>200) {
00152         LLA_TABLE[count].out_val=*(LLA_TABLE[count].function_ptr+200);
00153       }
00154       else {
00155         LLA_TABLE[count].out_val=*(LLA_TABLE[count].function_ptr+LLA_TABLE[count].in_val);
00156       }
00157       if (LLA_TABLE[count].out_pin!=0xFF) {
00158 #ifndef LINUX
00159         write_current(LLA_TABLE[count].out_pin,LLA_TABLE[count].out_val);
00160 #endif
00161       }
00162       LLA_TABLE[count].accumulator=0;
00163     }
00164     else {
00165       LLA_TABLE[count].accumulator+=LLA_TABLE[count].in_val;
00166     }
00167   }
00168   return (0);
00169 }
00170 
00171 void lla_print_active (ueac_t *ueac_state) {
00172   int i;
00173   printf ("lla_input var=0x%08lx\n",ueac_state->lla_input);
00174   for (i=0;i<10;i++) {
00175 #ifdef LINUX
00176     printf("\nLLA %d\n",i+1);
00177     if (LLA_TABLE[i].enable==ENABLE) {
00178       printf("enable state=ENABLED\n");
00179       printf("input pin = %d\n",LLA_TABLE[i].in_pin);
00180       printf("output pin = %d\n",LLA_TABLE[i].out_pin);
00181       printf("first data val = %d\n",*(LLA_TABLE[i].function_ptr+100));
00182       printf("period = %d\n",LLA_TABLE[i].period);
00183       printf("in_val = %d\n",LLA_TABLE[i].in_val);
00184       printf("out_val = %d\n",LLA_TABLE[i].out_val);
00185       printf("accumulator = %ld\n",LLA_TABLE[i].accumulator);
00186     }
00187     else {
00188       printf("enable state=DISABLED\n");
00189     }
00190 #else 
00191     printf("\nLLA %d\n\r",i+1);
00192     if (LLA_TABLE[i].enable==ENABLE) {
00193       printf("enable state=ENABLED\n\r");
00194       printf("input pin = %d\n\r",LLA_TABLE[i].in_pin);
00195       printf("output pin = %d\n\r",LLA_TABLE[i].out_pin);
00196       printf("first data val = %d\n\r",*(LLA_TABLE[i].function_ptr+100));
00197       printf("period = %d\n\r",LLA_TABLE[i].period);
00198       printf("in_val = %d\n\r",LLA_TABLE[i].in_val);
00199       printf("out_val = %d\n\r",LLA_TABLE[i].out_val);
00200       printf("accumulator = %ld\n\r",LLA_TABLE[i].accumulator);
00201     }
00202     else {
00203       printf("enable state=DISABLED\n");
00204     }
00205 #endif
00206 
00207   }
00208 }
